amendment.description: An amendment numbered 59 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit the EPA from using funds to give formal notification under, or prepare, propose, implement, administer, or enforce any rule or recommendation pursuant to section 115 of the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Perry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.
